originalText.text: so listen up people! you should try facial here with Karina, because this was literally the quickest, most relaxing, sculpting experience in my life. Karina has absolutely magical and soft touch to define every angle of your face plus the experience that Bamford provides… A-MA-ZING! the smell, the texture and speaking of spa space… you just feel that you’re cared of from any angle. please see after facial photo attached to see this face glows after the full work week. highly recommend for your self-care day to pamper yourself up to the gods

originalText.text: Had a great experience here! I booked a facial and massage with a friend and we both were incredibly happy! Mimi was our masseuse and Lina was our esthetician. We had a great morning, even enjoying the time before and after our appointments with tea, flavored water, snacks and the steam room.

text.text: Had a great experience here! I booked a facial and massage with a friend and we both were incredibly happy! Mimi was our masseuse and Lina was our esthetician. We had a great morning, even enjoying the time before and after our appointments with tea, flavored water, snacks and the steam room.

originalText.text:
Best spa in NYC! I had a pleasure to book a facial with Karina and it was an incredible experience from start to finish. My pores have never been cleaner :)  The spa is obviously very luxurious and gorgeous and makes you feel very pampered, but Karina is what made this facial so special. She is very knowledgeable about the process and has a very soft touch and beautiful energy about her.
I am an introvert so my energy usually gets drained by most people, but I felt the opposite during my visit. Karina made me feel rested, happy and my skin immediately looked so glowy and clear that I didn't even put make up on for days after. Highly recommend. 100% worth it

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of experiencing a facial by Karina, and it was truly exceptional. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. Karina's expertise and attention to detail were immediately evident.

The facial itself was a rejuvenating journey for my skin. The products used were of high quality and tailored to my specific needs. Karina's skillful hands and soothing touch made the entire experience incredibly relaxing.

What stood out the most was Karina's deep knowledge of skincare. She took the time to explain the process and gave me valuable insights into how to maintain healthy skin. It was evident that she genuinely cares about her clients' well-being.

I left feeling refreshed, with noticeably improved skin that had a healthy glow. Karina's facial was a top-notch experience, and I can't recommend her services enough. If you're looking for a skilled esthetician who delivers results and a delightful experience, Karina is the one to see.

originalText.text:
I went in for a Swedish Massage. I had the most amazing experience. After the massage my pain completely disappeared. I would recommend Bamford Spa. @
Albert (Spa Director) - thank you so much.
